mapper.select: select a.pd_no, a.s_no, b.s_name, a.pd_name, a.discount, a.price-(a.price*a.discount/100) price, a.main_img, a.status, a.sub_c, c.main_c from product a, store b, sub_c c where a.s_no = b.s_no and a.sub_c = c.sub_c order by pd_no desc

select a.pd_no, a.s_no, b.s_name, a.pd_name, a.price-(a.price*a.discount/100) price, a.discount, a.sale, a.main_img, a.status, a.sub_c, c.main_c, a.wishlist from product a, store b, sub_c c where a.s_no = b.s_no and a.sub_c = c.sub_c
order by pd_no desc
order by sale desc
order by price
order by pd_no desc, wishlist desc
order by wishlist desc

select a.pd_no, a.s_no, b.s_name, a.pd_name, a.price-(a.price*a.discount/100) price, a.discount, a.sale, a.main_img, a.status, a.sub_c, c.main_c, a.wishlist from product a join store b on a.s_no = b.s_no join sub_c c on a.sub_c = c.sub_c where c.main_c=#{param1};
select s_no, s_num, s_name, s_pic, to_char(openingdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') openingdate, s_id, staff_n, staff_t, staff_e, s_homepage from store
select s_no, s_num, s_name, s_pic, to_char(openingdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') openingdate, s_id, staff_n, staff_t, staff_e, s_homepage from store where s_no=#{s_no}
select s.s_no, s.s_name from store s, product p where s.s_no=p.s_no
mapper.update: update store set s_num=#{s_num}, s_name=#{s_name}, s_id=#{s_id}, staff_n=#{staff_n}, staff_e=#{staff_e}, staff_t=#{staff_t}, s_homepage=#{s_homepage} where s_no=#{s_no}
